title: Gadget Show Live 2012 - Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga
description: A look at our exciting Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga at The Gadget Show Live 2012. The show is the UK's leading consumer technology event and the destination for those obsessed with gadgets! Learn More: http://www.lenovo.com/
